amendment.description: Amendment requires a report to Congress on the added costs to the U.S. and other NATO countries as a result of the expansion of NATO membership.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 7 in the Congressional Record of February 13, 1995, to require a report on the added costs to the U.S. and other NATO countries as a result of the expansion of NATO membership.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
